page.title: 09School life at Merebrow.
page.content: A minibus collects some children from their homes and takes them to school and collects them at home time. Some come by car others walk. School startsat 8.55am and finishes at 3.15pm. During the winter the junior boys play football against teams from other schools for the League and Tournament Trophies. The girls play skittleball in the same Leagues and Tournaments. We play against the school that has surveyed this Domesday block with us. In summer we play rounders and take part in inter school athletics competitions and a swimming gala against other schools. Every Thursday we go to Tarleton Baths for swimming lessons. After school two nights we have a Gym club. Once a month we have Film club At Christmas we do a Concert for parents and friends.
